textAfterTable: The minimum monthly average balance in Curent A/cs to be maintained is given below: Particulars Individuals Other than Individuals Rural Centres           Rs.1000/- Rs.2000/- Semi-Urban Centres           Rs.2000/- Rs.2000/- Urban Centres Rs.5000/- Rs.5000/- Metropolitan           Rs.5000/- Rs.5000/- Kindly Note: Current A/cs : Penalty for non-maintenance of minimum balance. Rs.50/- per occasion (at the end of the day) subject to the following ceilings - Rural Rs. 100/- p.m; Semi-Urban Rs 200 p.m, Urban/Metro Rs. 300/- p.m. The business hours of our e-banking branches will be uninterrupted 6 hours on week days and three and a half hours on half-days.
